name: ThinkingwithSomebodyElsesHead
0:
”Alexa, open Richard Lloyd Jones Podcast”
”Alexa, start Richard Lloyd Jones Podcast”
”Alexa, ask Richard Lloyd Jones Podcast”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: richard lloyd jones podcast
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Science, philosophy, psychology, quantum physics, religion. In all these areas, we see the world based on what comes from others. Which means we're actually thinking with somebody else's head - not necessarily our own. And how much of those philosophies, ideas and theories are true? Thanks to the work of Brazilian/Austrian psychoanalyst and social scientist, Dr. Norberto Keppe, separating the wheat from the chaff is a lot easier today. We'll explore this rich and provocative territory in this podcast. Email me about your thoughts at rich@richjonesvoice.com

Here are a few quick tips when navigating our skill. The First thing to note, when opening the skill you’ll be playing the latest episode, but if that’s not what you’re looking for, you can always find something more specific. This skill allows you to play next or previous episode. In addition, you can ask the skill to play the newest or oldest episodes or if you want to get specific, play a specific episode by saying the episode number. Try some of these commands:

**Next/Previous Episode**
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, next”
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, previous”

**Select Latest Episode**
— “Alexa, ask Thinking with Somebody Elses Head to play latest episode” 

**Select First Episode**
— “Alexa, ask Thinking with Somebody Elses Head to start from first episode”
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
